code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import weatherReportReducer from"../reducers/weatherReportReducer";import weatherHistoryReducer from"../reducers/weatherHistoryReducer";const store=configureStore({reducer:{WeatherReport:weatherReportReducer,WeatherHistory:weatherHistoryReducer}});export const useAppDispatch=()=>useDispatch();export const useTypedSelector=useSelector;export default store;
